EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-05-22 AWS v Azure.ES-2019-05-22 AWS v Azure Invite 2 - Marketo.Email A
EmailTemplate.subject: See you in 2 hours?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-azure-discounts/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Join us on TODAY at 11 am ET <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-azure-discounts/]]> for the next installment of our AWS vs. Azure webinar series!
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-azure-discounts/]]>
Learn from cloud expert, Mor Cohen-Tal (CTO of Cloud) as she discusses:
- Fundamental discounting mechanisms available in AWS and Azure - How to optimally plan for new RIs purchases - How to maximize your current RI coverage - How to maximize RI utilization
I hope you will join us! Register now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-azure-discounts/]]> and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card.
Thanks, Andrew
PS - If you can't attend, register <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-azure-discounts/]]> anyway and we will send you the recording afterward.
